forecast.name: Today
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Light Rain then Mostly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain before 8am. Mostly cloudy. High near 53, with temperatures falling to around 51 in the afternoon. North northwest wind 13 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.
